casebody.data:
EX PARTE LOUD.

ORIGINAL.

No. 8.

Original.

Argued January 26, 1872. Decided March 25, 1872. Ex parte MeNiel, 13 Wall. 236, followed. Petition of a writ of prohibition to the District Court of the United States for the Eastern District of New York. The case is stated in the opinion. Mr. C. Donohue for petitioner. Mr. F. A. Wilcox for respondent. Mr. Justice Swayne

delivered the opinion of the court.

This ease differs in no material particular from the case of the like application by Alexander MeNiel just decided, 13 Wall. 236. The same considerations apply, and the result must be the same.

The application is denied and the petition dismissed.
